data.lyric:
[ti:What’s Your Country Song]
[ar:Thomas Rhett]
[al:What's Your Country Song]
[by:]

[00:00.00]What's Your Country Song - Thomas Rhett
[00:04.46]Lyrics by：Jesse Frasure/Thomas Rhett/Rhett Akins/Ashley Gorley/Parker Welling
[00:08.92]Composed by：Jesse Frasure/Thomas Rhett/Rhett Akins/Ashley Gorley/Parker Welling
[00:13.39]Did you grow up on a tractor
[00:16.18]Did your daddy let you drive
[00:18.94]Are you whiskey bent and hell bound
[00:21.70]Even though your mama tried
[00:24.46]Did you cruise down a backroad
[00:27.23]With your dixieland delight
[00:29.99]Are you on the chattahoochee
[00:32.75]On a barefoot blue jean night
[00:36.25]Everybody got a small town anthem
[00:38.97]Everybody got a story to tell
[00:41.91]Everybody got a hallelujah
[00:44.50]Everybody been through a little hell
[00:47.26]When you're rolling down a little two-lane highway
[00:49.98]And you turn your radio on
[00:52.77]Tell me which one hits you baby
[00:55.58]Yeah what's your country song
[01:01.13]Yeah what's your country song
[01:03.14]Do your exes live in Texas
[01:05.85]Are you so lonesome you could cry
[01:08.58]Are you heartbroke 'cause you know
[01:11.08]That ain't your truck in her drive
[01:14.15]Are your friends all in low places
[01:16.92]Underneath the neon moon
[01:19.85]Are you already country
[01:22.26]Back when country wasn't cool
[01:25.87]Everybody got a small town anthem
[01:28.61]Everybody got a story to tell
[01:31.46]Everybody got a hallelujah
[01:34.10]Everybody been through a little hell
[01:36.88]When you're rolling down a little two-lane highway
[01:39.60]And you turn your radio on
[01:42.42]Tell me which one hits you baby
[01:45.20]Yeah what's your country song
[01:50.66]Yeah what's your country song
[01:58.23]Who's your strawberry wine
[02:01.04]What's your family tradition
[02:03.79]What makes you turn it up
[02:05.13]Makes you raise your cup every time you listen
[02:10.04]Everybody got a small town anthem
[02:12.76]Everybody got a story to tell
[02:15.49]Everybody got a hallelujah
[02:18.24]Everybody been through a little hell
[02:20.98]When you're rolling down a little two-lane highway
[02:23.77]And you turn your radio on
[02:26.51]Tell me which one hits you baby
[02:29.30]Yeah what's your country song
[02:35.00]Yeah what's your country song
data.trans:
[ti:What’s Your Country Song]
[ar:Thomas Rhett]
[al:What's Your Country Song]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.46]//
[00:08.92]//
[00:13.39]你是否在拖拉机旁长大
[00:16.18]你的爸爸是否让你开车
[00:18.94]尽管你的妈妈尝试劝说
[00:21.70]你也难以抗拒威士忌的魅力
[00:24.46]你开车兜风的时候
[00:27.23]是否伴着Dixieland Delight这首音乐
[00:29.99]你是否穿着蓝色牛仔裤
[00:32.75]在查特胡奇河赤脚淌水
[00:36.25]每个人心中有一首小镇之歌
[00:38.97]每个人都有各自的传奇故事
[00:41.91]每个人都会在心里默默祈祷
[00:44.50]每个人都曾经历过苦难折磨
[00:47.26]当你在双车道尽情驰骋
[00:49.98]把收音机打开
[00:52.77]请告诉我 哪一首歌深得你心 宝贝
[00:55.58]你心中的乡村音乐是哪一首
[01:01.13]你心中的乡村音乐是哪一首
[01:03.14]你的前任们是否都住在德州
[01:05.85]你是否如此孤独以至于泪流满面
[01:08.58]你是否心碎不已因为你知道
[01:11.08]她不是坐在你副驾驶上的人
[01:14.15]你的朋友是否都是无名小卒
[01:16.92]在五彩斑斓的霓虹灯下
[01:19.85]当乡村音乐还未风靡的时候
[01:22.26]你是否已经沉迷于乡村音乐
[01:25.87]每个人的心中 都有一首小镇之歌
[01:28.61]每个人都有各自的传奇故事

[01:50.66]你心中的乡村音乐是哪一首
[01:58.23]谁是你的酸涩甜美初恋情人
[02:01.04]你的家族传统又是什么
